reviews.review_msg: He's a very interesting TA. I was highly motivated to attend his class. it was a very friendly environment. one feels very comfortable to ask questions. I definitely recommend him. he's a very easy going instructor.

omgggg!!!he is the best teacher ive ever seen!!he is funny he makes stuffs interesting to learn for students..well prepared for class and you will fall in love with him after you attended one of his class!!highly recommended!!he is cute
He's the best TA in the world! So funny and intriguing! He's teaching 121 at 8:30am next semester for anyone interested!
Very helpful TA and a very nice guy, we always get bonbons as rewards. Thoughtful and he cares about his students a lot. If I'm taking FREN 121 I would like to take the class with this teacher.
he is a very good TA?good teaching skills ? funny?helpful. He always give some candies as rewards. Anyways, if u are going to take French course, just look for this guy.
Super nice and very helpful TA.
He is very nice and helpful TA, with excellent teaching ability

HE IS AMAZING INSTRUCTOR. He is funny, engaging, and very helpful. Fast response on his email, very kind and helpful on his lecture time as well as office hour. YOU MUST go to his lecture since he provides the best lecture ever.
Etienne is the most helpful, and funny instructor I have ever met. If you go to his lecture, you will find it extremely for your tests. THE BEST INSTRUCTOR IN SFU.
He is best TA ever!! Attend every his class and consider what he say, you will definately get a good mark! Tres bien!;)
He's a very good TA: interesting, engaging and funny.
He is a completely awesome teacher! Very helpful, funny and comprehensive with the students!
Really awesome teacher, always kept things fun and interesting. Would highly recommend him!
He's the best professor I've ever had. He's very interesting, engaging and funny.
A very great professor. He is very interesting, funny and engaging teacher I've ever had.
He's the best TA everrrr! :) super nice, funny, and easy to talk to.
Very nice teacher, and very helpful to students. Clearly passionate about French and willing to help students learn in the best way that they can.
This professor is great, he teach us in the most effective way. Students learn a lot from him
I don't like french but he's very good teacher.
My favorite teacher this semester for sure!
the best teacher I've ever met!
He's kinda cute when he speaks french;)

Hey enjoys teaching the course and he's very approachable! Its not an easy class but if you show up to every class and do weekly review you should be fine. Even though its a language course and some people find it intimidating to speak up during class, he makes you feel comfortable and uses different kinds of activities and techniques that can help
highly recommended , very nice, helpful and explains the subject very well! . the only downside is the grading in this course, NOT his problem though :)
He is super super helpful, fun and funny. You should definitely choose him!!!
he is very sweeeeet & really helpful :) he LOVEs his students
Super nice guy!
Awesome!
He is the nicest prof I've ever seen.
Very nice TA, always willing to help the class. Highly recommend him to anyone taking this class.
he is veryyyyy nice and helpful
very nice teacher, really helpful.
Super nice person. Always willing to help. Extremely enthusiastic about teaching.
